items.content_html: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you‚Äôre building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.

items.content_html: The safeness-prevnames module is a lightweight Node.js client designed to interact with an API that stores previous usernames of Discord users. This client allows you to retrieve, save, delete, and count previous usernames through the API.
items.title: pertinentes/safeness-prevnames: The safeness-prevnames module is a lightweight Node.js client designed to interact with an API that stores previous usernames of Discord users. This client allows you to retrieve, save, delete, and count previous usernames through the API.
